attributes.action: Ask for some more help for overweight people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sadley a good friend of mine has lost her daughter due to her being over weight and getting no help,sadley this is not a single case, if Lyndsay and many others was a smoker or anorexic they would have got help from every direction...but sadley all they get offered is thier name on a waiting list....however while waiting the problem gets worse..we need some action on tackling obesity...some drop in centres, hospital treatment and counseling more advice for the families to help. Please show your support by signing this petition
